name: Ninja Darter Demo Part 2
description:
NOTE: Requires a controller. Xbox One is recommended.

It has also come to my attention that there are numerous game breaking bugs currently. At the moment, I do not have time to fix these issues, as I'm a one man team. I'm currently focused on my next project.

Please leave all bug reports in the comments below and I will get back to them ASAP. 

PLEASE RUN Ninja Darter.exe AFTER UNZIPPING TO START THE GAME.

This iteration is intended to be an improvement to the first Ninja Darter.

This version includes more responsive player controls, as well as:

-Wall jumping, wall sliding, dashing,  and switching weapons

- An armor meter for extra defense

- Emerald collection as well as coins

- An overall heavier and compact feel to player movement

- Universal Render  Pipeline to deliver lighting to the world

List of bugs:

- Don't stay on the title screen for too long as it hogs memory

- Emerald pick up and weapons switching doesn't work in some levels

- XP bar may not work in some levels (cause unknown at this time)

These problems were mainly a result from inefficient and/ or messy code. I plan to fix these problems for the full release: a game called MC Ninja. You can follow its progress here:

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MC_Ninja/

Discord: https://discord.gg/RpNk9Mxw22
